name: Mementotlan Angwitch
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Memento" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Mementotlan Angwitch". You can target 1 Level 2 or lower "Memento" monster in your GY; destroy 1 "Memento" monster you control, and if you do, Special Summon the targeted monster. You can only use each effect of "Mementotlan Angwitch" once per turn.
